intro: Sphaeralcea, commonly known as evening primrose, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. These plants are native to North America and are characterized by their showy yellow or orange flowers that open in the late afternoon. Many species are cultivated for their ornamental value and for the oil-rich seeds used in various commercial applications.
